explains: v. 装配（assemble 的过去分词）；集合
wordGroup: assemble language n. 汇编语言
assemble line 作业的装配线

sentences.en: He preached to the assembled multitude.
sentences.cn: 他向聚集在那里的民众布道。

sentences.en: The manager has assembled a world-class team.
sentences.cn: 经理已聚集了一个世界一流的班子。

sentences.en: The workers were assembled in the hall.
